bibl.title: The Earliest Chemical Industry [i.e. the manufacture and use of alum].
bibl.note: Mentions references to alum in the papyri, e.g. P. Holmiensis, etc. - Non vidimus.
bibl.seg: Singer Charles, The Earliest Chemical Industry [i.e. the manufacture and use of alum].
